channel.title: apt on Peter's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in apt on Peter's Blog

item.title: Cheatsheet for pkg manager
item.description: Cheatsheet for package manager go mod pip apt ubuntu 20.04 pip pip install -i https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple some-package 升级 pip 到最新的版本 (>=10.0.0) 后进行配置： pip install pip -U pip config set global.index-url https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple 如果您到 pip 默认源的网络连接较差，临时使用本镜像站来升级 pip： pip install -i https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple pip -U apt ubuntu 20.04 # 默认注释了源码镜像以提高 apt update 速度，如有需要可自行取消注释 deb https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/ubuntu/ focal main restricted universe multiverse # deb-src https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/ubuntu/ focal main restricted universe multiverse deb https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/ubuntu/ focal-updates main restricted universe multiverse # deb-src https://mirrors.
